description:
Classic Blundstone comfort in a heeled boot. These boots merge classic Blundstone comfort with timeless Chelsea boot styling, with a higher cut, narrower gore panel and a sleeker, more feminine toe.

  • Weatherproof, full-grain leather upper is seamlessly fused to sole to provide resilient construction
  • Leather-lined for durability and comfort
  • Polyurethane midsole provides cushioning
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Asymmetric toe and block heel
  • Thermo-urethane outsole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction
  • Includes an extra set of footbeds for fit adjustment
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Women's Series Heel 1671 Boots - Women's
